https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/3KTrdrr7HQcsVlLhqHROSkGvp0m.jpg Classic tale of King Arthur and how his wife is kidnapped by his evil sister. Lancelot is sent out to try and retrieve the lost queen and unfortunately falls in love with her. Forbidden love, revenge, family rivalry, and magic are all prominent themes. Arthur the King
